tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE text_data (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    text_data TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE sentiment_data (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    text_data VARCHAR(255),
    sentiment_score FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE text_metadata (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    text_id INT,
    source VARCHAR(50),
    date_published DATE
)

CREATE TABLE text_analysis_results (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    text_id INT,
    analysis_type VARCHAR(50),
    result_text VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE text_keywords (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    text_id INT,
    keyword VARCHAR(50),
    relevance_score FLOAT
)
